page.title: 12Recreation
page.content:
The area is ideal for fell-walking, pony-trekking and ski-ing. There are facilities for bowling, cricket, squash, badminton & darts in Caldbeck. Many residents enjoy gardening. CLUBS: Cubs & Brownies, Young Farmers' Club, Women's Institute, Mother's Union and Caldbeck Players all meet in Caldbeck.
The Cumbrian sport of HOUND TRAILING has a good following. Before a trail is held a man walks the route pulling a drag soaked in aniseed. Each participating hound is marked at the start, so that no substitute can be put in during the race which may cover considerable distances out of sight of spectators. The hounds are not fed before being 'slipped' but are given a meal at the end of the race. Betting takes place on the outcome.
